original_text: David arose and went, along with his men, and killed two hundred of the Philistines. And David brought their foreskins, which were given in full number to the king, that he might become the king's son-in-law. And Saul gave him his daughter Michal for a wife.
korean_text: 다윗이 일어나서 그의 부하들과 함께 가서 블레셋 사람 이백 명을 죽이고 그들의 포피를 가져다가 수대로 왕께 드려 왕의 사위가 되고자 하니 사울이 그의 딸 미갈을 다윗에게 아내로 주었더라

sentences.original_text: and killed two hundred of the Philistines
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 블레셋 사람 이백 명을 죽였습니다

sentences.original_text: which were given in full number to the king
that he might become the king's son-in-law
And Saul gave him his daughter Michal
sentences.korean_translation: 사울이 그에게 자기 딸 미갈을 주었습니다
